reapack.name: tracker.lua
reapack.desc: Hackey-Trackey: A tracker interface similar to Jeskola Buzz for MIDI and FX editing.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added help (F1)

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added shortcut to duplicate pattern

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Forgot to turn off printKeys before committing

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Store what settings we last worked with in the MIDI item

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Show name of track the instance is on + Show the name of the MIDI take + Edit take name with CTRL+N

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug with shift item up/down not being available

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added . as an alternative to Delete + Fixed issue with roundoff error when determining number of rows

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix such that duplicate patterns don't share the same automation pool ID

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make selection follow the MIDI item selected in the tracker upon switching

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Improve help a little bit

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix: Set out channel after channel duplication

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix: Made sure that if there is more than one OPT field (can happen after glue), the others get removed

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added column to program CC events

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added ability to play notes while entering them (hit CTRL + R to arm!)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added note delay

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added tab and shift tab functionality for navigation

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow for pan and width to be set to left

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed rounding errors

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added multi CC extension (CTRL+ over MOD section switches to column view) + Bugfix CCs + Bugfix interpolation on empty FX

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Store which CC tracks are open + Named CC tracks where available

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added shift operator for CC channels

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added shift operator for automation FX + Fixed bug in FX copy/paste system

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug copy paste and delete block system

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Merged pull request from r4dian with buzz theme (thanks r4dian!)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix loss of docking status

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added mouse interaction

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug mouse interaction + Fixed bug titling the window

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Persistent settings + Added MIDI panic button (F12) + Added STOP command (F8)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow pattern resize (click pattern length and type new value)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed issue with pasting block over pattern end giving nil problems

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed rare bug change in pattern length

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug in copy/paste system when copying full rows

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Started implementing scale helpers (WIP)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option for harmony helper (F9 to open, arm tracker with CTRL+R to hear the chords you click). Option to insert chords pending.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added ability to insert chords from harmony helper (CTRL + click). Fixed bug involving note insertion over OFC symbols.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added inversions (add ALT or SHIFT when clicking chords). + Added harmonic minor scale (sort of). + Fixed bugs regarding note insertion.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added scale to cfg file so that it doesn't constantly reset

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Repackaging scales lib

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor bugfix when no options available yet

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug that falsely allowed notes beyond end causing starting note in next column to switch column.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added sixth chords for the minor and major scale

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to follow what MIDI item is selected

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug in pattern length rendering and allow resizing of columns

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add option for always record

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to only listen (escape when record is on)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added hackey mode and optional CRT effect

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix for when item is deleted

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix regarding scale behaviour when harmony helper is open

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Changed resolution change to Alt + Shift + Up/Down to avoid conflict with windows screenflipping shortcut.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added saving defaults for advance / octave / resolution / envelope

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor bugfix to make sure that renoise keyset is immediately available after change

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Option to follow tracker within a track

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added mouse interactivity for the bottom panel (resolution, octave, record etc)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix bottom option + Added renoise-like theme with different font + Added shift+space as play from in the renoise keyset

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug involving envelopes that were constantly resetting and added fast envelope.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added: Optional note length column (reveal with CTRL + + twice) + The value indicates the length of the last tick that the note is active. FF = the full length of the last tick.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix: Fixed bug that caused copy error when subtick fields were being copied (delay or end)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix: Fixed delete key not working in renoise theme.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added some more renoise keybindings (SHIFT + place note and others) + Fixed bug related to storage of settings with the bottom bar + Make script remember last position and size

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + More renoise shortcuts added (see help) + Fix regarding the Play From command

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed play from + Set default FOV back to 32 rows + Added shift pgup, pgdown, home, end

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed problems with paste behavior (now mends so that we don't get OFFs at the end of the block (can toggle this behavior in options screen) + Added shortcut for closing hackey trackey

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added some extra shortcuts + Insert row (default = CTRL + Ins) + Remove row (default = CTRL + Backspace) + Wrap down (default = CTRL + Shift + Ins) + Wrap up (default = CTRL + Shift + Backspace)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Block interpolation without distance

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option for swapping y and z for different keyboard layouts

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option for midi program change column (beta)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Made sure CC0 is possible

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added optional per channel program change select

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to make looped section follow pattern that is active

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to set loop when tracker is opened

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to switch track

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix pattern duplication due to incorrect usage of CreateNewMIDIItemInProj (Thanks Meta!)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Started work on integration with Hackey Machines (receiving config override info).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Made sure the sequencer can pass row info to HT.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix typo.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor bugfix.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix issue when not using settings stored in pattern

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option for custom key layouts in external file (userkeys.lua, should be created on script startup). + Added option to remove minimum size constraint

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Ignore OFF MIDI items when browsing. Do not allow browser to be opened on OFF MIDI Items. + Cleaned up automatic file write.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to suppress all automatic resizing of the tracker.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added passthrough of commands which are configurable as custom keys.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add maxwidth parameter to config file.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add maximum height to config file. + Added automatic rescaling of number of rows.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Made sure ticks per beat also highlights beats correctly. + Fetch channel output settings from track.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to override row highlighting.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added optional mode to store row highlighting override in pattern.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Rename reaper-kb.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Copy target channel when duplicating pattern.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add flag for custom parameter to kill hackey trackey (set the last one to 1) + Make open patterns close HT.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to follow location in arrange.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix exception when MIDI item is removed by CTRL+Z.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Prevent shift from modifying pitch keys that aren't letters (thanks hangnef).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added check whether a new FX column was added and make it trigger an auto-refresh. + Added support for using track colors. + Added mechanism that allows fallback on nearest track when track is deleted. + Added mechanism that attempts waiting a few cycles when item goes missing (for glueing from arrange).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add ability to start HT without MIDI item selected. + Store whether HT is docked or not.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Start tracker on first note column.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Start tracker on first note column properly.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add config option for item color instead of track color (thanks hangnef!). + Invert header color if luminance is too close to item color. + Minor tweaks. + Fix issue with overhanging text fields.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor tweak header renderposition.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix column header colors.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix item deletion.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix pattern deletion.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor bugfix shift + note = next column (thanks dri_ft!). + Remove default enter = close.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + make shift + chord behaviour more like renoise: return to first column and advance when shift is released + add advanceDouble and advanceHalve commands + add upByAdvance and downByAdvance commands

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + add note names panel

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix shift functionality. Catch keystrokes that cannot be converted to valid characters.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow different font sizes. + Refactor menu handling to make it a little less horrible. + Bugfix: Make sure key mapping isn't clicked when layout is changed.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add ctrl + o as secondary key for options.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Disable printkeys

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add default channel = 1 option.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Update loop when following selection.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added clicking on left column to set position. + Added optional graphical effects. + Added extra validation of item and take. + Fixed issue with duplicate defer loop.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor bugfix scrolling behavior. + Quietly ignore missing keys. + Improve scrollbar behaviour.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix note off AZERTY layout Renoise.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Support channel level mutes.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix mute status. Make sure added notes respect mute status.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add support for lowest midi octave.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix remember position.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Only show pulse warning once. + Add config option that allows delay or note end to always be open as a preference. + Don't let font run off screen.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added sink color scheme.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Block operation while recording.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add optional MIDI step sequencing via global memory / JSFX (BETA).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make MIDI step sequencing respect advance setting.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Just realized I'm working from the future. + Added note advance mode that skips to next note instead of moving forward by advance. + Add toggle to enable advance by note mode (CTRL + T) + Add optional bigger line indicator when playing. + Improve ellipsis rendering. + Optionally enable CRT mode for sink theme. + Minor UI fixups (selection used to not quite overlap with cursors).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor style tweaks. + Bugfix note advance mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixup wraparound.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Clamp note advance to selection. + Move advance to next note mode higher up.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make selection follow block-select when this configuration option is active.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug scrollbar that would clamp position back to 0 when updating notes in certain edge cases.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow to disable making undo points for column reassignments.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add option for note offs on release for record input kbd.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix new feature for channels > 1.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix issue with CC's not being deleted when "inserted" off the pattern. + Make CC's more readable on sink theme.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Autodetect Hackey Trackey Sampler on the track and convert to tracker mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Name the effect channels appropriately.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Force termination of every effect (workaround to prevent MIDI chase from applying non-needed effects the first row of a loop).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix termination markers. + Add arpeggiator.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Improve labelling panning.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add vibrato.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Force column mode when in sampler mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make sure rec preview can be heard.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Remember last velocity that was used (a separate one for sampler vs regular MIDI mode).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Specify hackey trackey sampler sample indices in hex.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add play position indicator on the sampler.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Show play marker on sample editor as well.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug not looping near end of sample. + Clamp loop at the ends of samples.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Reset zoom when focused sample is overwritten.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Store sample names in hackey trackey sample playback.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Handle arpeggio and retrigger on a per channel basis. Fix bug where arpeggio wouldn't reset back to root note.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug that didn't allow selecting the last row with the mouse.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Don't perform playback function call on channel in hackey trackey playback if it isn't playing.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add multiple output mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add option to shift horizontally (shift + ins and shift + backspace). + Make copy paste feel less glitchy.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Finetune mouse selection. Add left, right mouse combo for selecting a region.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix whole line copy.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug that could cause nil reference when splitting item on which a selection is currently active.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix issue in hackey trackey playback which could make first sample disappear due to memory clobbering (regression introduced in 2.52). + Always load first sample into sample editor when plugin is first opened during a session.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added per-sample mute and solo options in hackey trackey playback.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix regression zoom sample editor.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow preview channel through even when the played sample is muted.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Change doubleclick speed HTP.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add "Fix indicator in view" mode

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug that would not release note in numeric row on renoise keymap.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + More gracefully handle deletion of an item during playback when line follow is on. + Hotfix for issue with button location not being available in narrow mode. + Fix bug with omni channel note not being silenced properly on release. + Fix issue with note stop/starts repeating (regression introduced in 2.66).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Ensured that row index is consistent between edit and play mode. + Ensured when setting the fixed position (CTRL+ALT+LMB) that clicked row is chosen, not row above. + Minor performance tweak (no observable behaviour change)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make scrollbar grab focus. + Enumerate capmode states.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix follow row mode which could lead to invalid dereference when no item is selected.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Spin out sample handling into separate library. + Copy/paste names with clipboard actions. + Parse name better using loader script.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Update to latest sample lib.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make load_sample appear as main script.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug in sample library that prevented proper initialization of sample playback module.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix issue in Hackey Trackey Playback that could lead to memory clobbering when using long samples.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Workaround for initial sample issue.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Serialize mute/solo state in presets.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Force loop points in hackey trackey playback to be sorted.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug that could lead to clicks when going from bidi to forward or no loop. + Fix bug that could cause click when running past the end of a very long sample whose pitch changed during playback.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow interpolation for velocities only.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add shortcut for muting all rows.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Implement optional scrub mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Don't reset arm status when seeking on same track.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix: Also advance when entering values in second velocity column on a space without notes.
